thread.title: Delfon D Lancaster
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Delfon D Lancaster

author: Delfon D Lancaster
title: Delfon D Lancaster
text: My delivery guys were excellent provided world class service. The furniture I purchased was hard to get into my home however, the guys used every option until they successfully were able to complete the job. Highly recommend Gardner White to anyone looking to purchase furniture.
